snippet: Pemex said that there was no evidence of a major spill, but that the blast had forced the evacuation of more than 300 workers from the rig.
abstract: Explosion on oil platform owned by Mexican company Pemex in Gulf of Mexico kills four people and injures as many as 16 others; incident raises concerns about safety record of company that has seen similar accidents.
lead_paragraph: Pemex said that there was no evidence of a major spill, but that the blast had forced the evacuation of more than 300 workers from the rig.

headline.main: 4 Killed in Explosion and Fire on Pemex Mexican Oil Platform
headline.print_headline: 4 Killed in Explosion and Fire on a Mexican Oil Platform
